name: Unsplash Chat Bot
description: An Unsplash Bot for Zoom Chat

unsplash_client_id.description: Your Unsplash Access Key, it's the same for production and development, found your Unsplash App Page

zoom_client_id.description: Your Zoom Production Client ID, found on your Zoom App Credentials page

zoom_client_secret.description: Your Zoom Production Client Secret, found on your Zoom App Credentials page

zoom_robot_jid.description: Your Zoom Production Bot JID, found on your Zoom Features page

zoom_verification_code.description: Your Zoom domain verification code (Optional, used to verify your domain name, found on your Zoom Submit page)
